title: Execution ForkValidator.ValidatePayload
body:
Only one of my nodes is displaying this error thus far... Because of this the node seems to lag behind. Any idea? I also had to rollback this node due to another error.

**Erigon Version**
`erigon version 2.49.2-stable-a8ae8a03`

**Startup Command**
```
/home/erigon/erigon/build/bin/erigon \
--chain=mainnet \
--torrent.upload.rate="1024mb" \
--torrent.download.rate="1024mb" \
--datadir="$(eval echo ~$USER)/erigon-eth" \
--internalcl \
--chain=mainnet \
--port=30501 \
--http.port=9201 \
--authrpc.port=9101 \
--authrpc.addr=0.0.0.0 \
--authrpc.vhosts=* \
--torrent.port=42501 \
--private.api.addr=127.0.0.1:9090 \
--nat="extip:$(curl -s ifconfig.me)" \
--http \
--http.api=eth,erigon,web3,net,debug,trace,txpool \
--ws \
--ws.compression
```

